attributes.action: Abandon his intention to increase the top rate of income tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in this country work hard to earn a living and the tax system alreadly takes 40p in £ for many workers. A 45% top rate will be higher than most European countries and will be a huge disincentive to people, not just those eaning over £150k, but all those families aspiring to earn a decent living. Also by increasing income tax, it also hits pensioners, whereas an increase in the National insurance cap would not. This is dogmatic Old Labour.
